name: Blockhead (skulez)
description:
Blockhead is a short puzzle platformer. You play using two buttons, one to jump and one to place blocks. 

The levels begin really easy, but get much more difficult as you progress. There are only ten levels at the moment, but I might add more in the future. I've tried to set up each level so you encounter and 'master' each obstacle as you progress through the short courses -- which I'd love to hear your thoughts on!

Feedback is encouraged and appreciated! I hope you guys enjoy the game.
